Others: The Boston Red Sox won a walk-off game against the Baltimore Orioles with a score of 5-3.
Tyler O'Neill hit a three-run homer in the bottom of the 10th inning to secure the win.
The Red Sox are now four games back with 16 games left in the season, still in contention for the American League wild-card race.
The Red Sox will face the New York Yankees in their next series, starting on Thursday.
James Paxton, a left-handed pitcher for the Red Sox, announced his plans to retire after the 2024 season.
